original_text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said, Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts?
korean_text: 예수께서 그 생각을 아시고 이르시되 너희가 어찌하여 마음에 악한 생각을 하느냐

sentences.original_text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said
Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 너희 마음에 악한 생각을 하느냐?
